item.title: The speech by Litong Lin on the 32nd anniversary of Tiananmen Square Protest
item.description: The speech by Litong Lin on the 32nd anniversary of Tiananmen Square Protest Ladies and gentlemen, my name is Litong Lin, the representative of Assembly of Citizens. I am honored to have the opportunity to speak here. The host had just said that our organization and I are “standing up and resisting the autocratic tyranny of CCP.” If we compare ourselves to the men and women who gave their lives for a better China or to the braves who were thrown into prison because of their actions of striving for unalienable human rights, we must say we can’t afford this reputation.
